name: Fruity Garden
description:
Match three or more similar colour fruits in this multiplayer and single player game. 

- Tons of new fruit rush levels available for players
- Reach the match puzzle target and win the game
- Unlock new game boosters
- Play all levels and explore a sweet and thrilling fruit world
- Compete in a 1vs1 battle against another player in the multiplayer mode
- Collect and win daily rewards
